title: Technical Review: Claude 3.7 Sonnet & Claude Code for Developers
description: Claude is often praised as the best LLM for coding. Claude 3.7 takes this a huge step further with its new reasoning abilities and the new Claude Code CLI tool. We dive deep into the technical details and see how Claude 3.7 compares to other popular models and whether Claude Code is a game-changer for developers.
author: Yusuf
